website_summaries.verdict: These clogs aren't going to win any fashion shows, but they will prevent foot pain for workers who are on their feet all day. Easy-to-clean uppers make them a favorite in restaurant kitchens and health care environments.
pros: Easy to slip on and off
Good for kitchen and health care workers
Stays on your feet, unlike other brands of clogs
Removable molded polyurethane insole with  contoured arch
cons: Not as non-slip as other clogs

customer_reviews.title: Will never buy a pair of shoes on-line again because if I'd seen what cheap clunky plastic crap they are
customer_reviews.text: Within the first few seconds of wearing the shoes a permanent crease formed where I had bent my toes. Will never buy a pair of shoes on-line again because if I'd seen what cheap clunky plastic crap they are, I'd never have wasted my money on them. I guess they're ok for going out to get the mail which is the only place I'd ever be caught dead wearing them--actually I'm embarrassed to wear them then, too, but if I walk quickly enough no one usually sees me. Of course, walking quickly is not recommended because they will fly off. Let's face it: they're worthless. Have had other Skechers shoes and really liked them; but, these are junk.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L.

customer_reviews.title: The sole peels off the shoes, have to Crazy Glue avery few weeks-
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed that the sole pads peel apart from the shoe and have to Crazy glue them every few weeks! Then the return policy expires right before the peeling starts!
customer_reviews.author: usamall.us

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Work Without Them!
customer_reviews.text: I work in the service industry and swear by these clogs. I'm on my 3rd pair and will continue to use them. Great for standing when slow & great for running around when its busy. Never slip off the heal! Perfect for spills...toes normally get soaked, however these clogs keep you dry and cool. If you work on your feet around wet and slippery surfaces, then these are made for you.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Go one up
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I ordered a size up from what I’m usually wear and still snuggled, not very tight but I as wearing them throughout my shift they becoming loose. Hopefully a couple more nights will fit better. UPDATE: they were too tight. I end up returning them and got a bigger size. However, the new shoes are just longer not wider. The navicular which is the top of your foot is very tight. I highly recommend to get a size up! I like my shoes a little loose so I can wear them with white socks or wool socks.
customer_reviews.author: Burt C

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I"m downgrading my review from 4 stars to 1. This is my second pair of these Skechers. I've had them about 6 weeks and the sole is coming off. My first pair lasted two years before the sole came loose. I'll try to glue the sole back, but this is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: DouginNC

customer_reviews.title: Foot killer.
customer_reviews.text: I wore it for 4 days now I have bruises on my foot. I felt extremely tired after long hours working in the kitchen. its very tough plastic material that does not stretch nor takes the shape of your feet. The bottom of shoe is inclined towards back. I felt like I was walking on my heels all day where heels should be higher. I threw the shoes away and now Im wearing my old one again.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality...Small sizing
customer_reviews.text: I am giving these shoes a fairly good rating only because of the quality of the shoe. They felt good in my hand and looked to be made sturdy and with quality materials. Take notice of the sizing, they are way too small. It was like trying to fit a man-sized foot into a child-sized shoe. I could not get my foot past the opening that was just too narrow. I thought I was sent the wrong size, but the size on the shoe was correct. Either they are made too small or the size is mislabeled.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Heel is narrow and very tight.
customer_reviews.text: Unable to wear these. Toe box is OK but the heel upper is tight and uncomfortable. Very difficult to slip the shoe on without using a shoe horn on the heel. Will now take a Stanley knife and cut most of the heel upper away. Should then be able to shuffle around in these. I bought size 11 . My regular shoe size is 10 1/2 . Disappointed. Crocs always fit fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Samdog

customer_reviews.title: Tore up in two weeks
customer_reviews.text: Sole on the bottom of the show is coming off after only two weeks of being purchase. I wouldn't recommend buying this product!!!
customer_reviews.author: LaToya Hornsby

customer_reviews.title: Decent work shoes for a budget.
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoes but they aren't quite as durable as you would expect "work shoes" to be. They also are much cheaper than you would expect work shoes to be. I used them for a month before I swapped them out for similar "Shoes For Crews" which have better grip and are more durable. But a bit more pricey.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelWic

customer_reviews.title: They have better nonslip than many of more expensive brands I've tried ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair and would sugest them to anyone that needs an inexpensive nonslip pair of shoes for the kitchen. I work as a professional cook and wear these in and out of the kitchen. They are a little tight to start but quickly break in. They have better nonslip than many of more expensive brands I've tried over the years, and get about a year of use out of them before having to purchase a new pair. I would sugest keeping a tube of shoe goo on hand to reglue the pads on the bottom when the come loose. This is the reason for only 4 stars. They are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: benjiman abundis

customer_reviews.title: Did not last a month.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they were too cheap to be good but since they were Sketchers I figured I would give them a try. They were comfy and nice while they lasted, which was just long enough so I couldn't return them anymore. I wish I had spent the extra money and bought some Birkenstocks.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Canelo

customer_reviews.title: See review.
customer_reviews.text: Wire in toe box. Runs roughly 1/2 size too large in length. Good slip resistance. Has some glue film that starts to dissolve immediately. No arch support. Very painful at upper rim of top of foot. Creases upon trying on. Basically, a semi rigid construct, mass produced, that doesn't conform or befit various podiatry.
customer_reviews.author: word

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a few downsides.
customer_reviews.text: Quality is nice but I feel I am wearing stilts. The sole are very thick! I almost turned my ankle a couple of times on uneven ground. If you want to feel tall and walk very carefully these are for you. Easy on an off is a feature that works.
customer_reviews.author: MR.

customer_reviews.title: Good brands..  bad model
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. As a Xmas gift. A Month later the soles are off. Looks like it lost the fue that golds it together. As a frecuent user of this brands. Im surprised with the poor performance. Since i live outside of the us, i cant retiren them for a refund. Garbage dont waste your money..
customer_reviews.author: Gennys Restituyo

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for and im not about to drop a half a weeks wages on fast superior dancecos.
customer_reviews.text: buy them, wear them out in 100 shifts, buy them again is you so desire, and don't slip around... not comfy but utilitarian and robust. never busted my ass as a result of slipping while wearing them and saved myself the angst of burning my feet with chicken Stock thanks to the whole clog principle. you get what you pay for and im not about to drop a half a weeks wages on fast superior dancecos.. so i got a set of these. even push...
customer_reviews.author: The Voider of Implied Warranties III

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for firm support
customer_reviews.text: I am a female, but I needed a Firm shoe that was wider then most women shoes. I bought these around 4 years ago. I have worn them doing yard work and gardening. They clean up beautifully. They are finally wearing out in the sole and I will most likely buy another pair. I have gotten a lot of wear out of them.
customer_reviews.author: johio

customer_reviews.title: Giving them some time
customer_reviews.text: I buy these for my son who works in a restaurant kitchen. His previous two pairs came unglued, very quickly, under the balls of his feet, within a week of wearing them. We're hoping it's just because I had them stored in a warm closet, and not a fault of the shoe manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: GreenMtnDoll

customer_reviews.title: The worst thing about the shoes are they are supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is definitely a size smaller than what it should be. The worst thing about the shoes are they are supposed to be slip resistant and they are not. I have slipped numerous times wearing these. I will have to buy another pair from a different company. The only good thing about these shoes are that they look really nice but not safe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Walter I.

customer_reviews.title: Worst Skechers
customer_reviews.text: I basically like in Skechers. I wear a pair as slippers, another pair for walking, and yet another pair for normal daily activities. This model fits MUCH differently than the others. A bit shorter and much narrower. I kept them assuming they needed more "break-in" time, but no luck. Still too tight and still uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: waterviewgal

customer_reviews.title: Not for people on their feet all day
customer_reviews.text: Clogs should be comfortable just by the design. These are not. The soles have no give at all, so they left my feet and my back in pain. They run small, so using an insole is impossible. The price was appealing, so if that is all that matters, they'll be acceptable. Just don't plan on a shift longer than an hour...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Need help from the seller
customer_reviews.text: The soles started coming off after 4 or 5 uses. Tried to clean, dry and use gorilla glue. Right shoe is half off already again. This pair should be replaced by the seller. SoMething went wrong in the manufacturing process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day and they are like wearing a comfortable pair of slippers all day. My toes also have problems and I love the fit in the front of these shoes they are just wide enough not to put extra pressure and allow room for it to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Annette fiore

customer_reviews.title: Bad experience
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 13 shoe in all my other shoes. These were so ridiculously large that my wife called them "flippers" when she first saw them. I tried a size 12 by the same manufacturer and they were still too large. So I finally tried a size 11, again by the same manufacturer and though they murdered my toes they refused to stay on my heels and continuously pulled my socks off my feet. I believe this manufacturer misses the mark in sizing, but I appreciate greatly Amazon's no question asked return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Krak

customer_reviews.title: Hubby wears these around the house. He enjoys them ...
customer_reviews.text: Hubby wears these around the house. He enjoys them well enough they were just a lot stiffer than he had thought they would be. Wouldn't have bought them in store but they're decent enough he'll wear them out.
customer_reviews.author: a.c.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Originally got these shoes from a Skechers store and the lasted over 2 years..working in healthcare that was pretty good for me. Decided to order what I thought was the same shoe through Amazon. The original pair lasted less than a year before the bottom began to tear away from the shoe. Thinking maybe it was just a bad batch I foolishly ordered another pair just for the bottom to begin to tear away from the right shoe less than a week!!!! Will never order these shoes or any for that matter via Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Healthcare professional

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hope for
customer_reviews.text: Totally dissapointed with this clogs to begin with, their not so light and the insoles doesn't provide any comfort and my poor husband got home complaining how terrible they were. He already wore them and can't return the shoes. Absolutely waste of money. If you want a nice comfy pair of shoes that won't hurt your feet this is not the pair for you.
customer_reviews.author: Bettyh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I buy this every year, he works in a kitchen...so you can imagine the kind of beating this shoe goes through. I just buy him a fresh pair when the soles start to sink. He really likes them and they are sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Giannina_G

customer_reviews.title: Easy in, easy out!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Has a very large toe so it looks a little bulky. Overall I like it and its easy to wear. I have an Achilles problem and this has really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The work clogs were so tight I couldn't even use them. They said they were a size 14, but I could barely squeeze my feet in, and only wore them for about an hour before switching back to my old boots. Order a size or two above what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Left narrower than right
customer_reviews.text: The left shoe I got feels about a half size narrower than the right shoe, despite having the same size written on the sole of the shoe. Not sure what that’s about. Also, the rubber gripping on the end started falling off after only a month and a half of regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Maddox Larson

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought these less than a week ago and they have came apart. I see many complaints about these shoes. Why are they still allowed to sell these shoes. The opening is way too tight. You can't really wear any socks you need a really thin sock. The bottom has came from off the shoe. The only reason I have not sent them back is I work on Drill Ships in the Gulf Of Mexico. When I get back on land it will be too late to send back $30 something dollars down the drain. I just gave my money away.
customer_reviews.author: lamarkus houston

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all
customer_reviews.text: These are bad for your feet. No comfort after wearing all day and my feet hurt after wearing at work. I would not recommend anyone to buy these shoes. I just purchased a Merrell brand and hope these will be better.
customer_reviews.author: The Polarbare

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth The Headache
customer_reviews.text: As much as I love Skechers this product is atrocious. With zero arc support, sizes way smaller than advertised and (my chief complaint) a "slip proof bottom" that has fallen off the shoe. Due to its steep over pricing and having dealt with a previous return when the shoe was too small I felt that I had to take matters into my own hands by hot gluing the bottoms (which last longer the adhesive that originally came on the shoe). Skechers has truly dropped the ball with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cade J. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Not the shoe for me.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was uncomfortable. The shoe slopped up and down on my heal when I walked, and there was no arch support . The toe was really tight, and overall the shoe just didn’t fit my foot well enough for me to keep them and wear in surgery where I have to stand for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great for light outdoor work!
customer_reviews.text: We actually bought two pair. My husband always wore LLBean clogs for outside in the yard. When they wore out we could not get them again. These are less than half the price and easy slip on for walking the dog or light work. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Fran T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.text: I am a surgeon and wear these in the O.R. They are comfortable to wear all day. A bit squeaky on waxed floors. The best thing is that the insoles can be removed and they can be scrubbed with hot soapy water to clean them. I suppose they could be put in a dishwasher as well. I have only been wearing them for a few weeks to long-term wear is unknown at this point. I bought them to replace some aging "Anywears" brand clogs. These clogs have a closed back which helps keep them on walking down the hallways, which the Anywears did not have.
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Do you not purchase bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Only worn a handful of times you can see body the print on the insole is an even slightly worn and the tread on the bottom is falling off tried to go to sketcher see if they would do anything about that trying to email them was difficult if not impossible to get an email to go through highly recommend not purchasing this item
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: right price some comfortable but has to chance just 2 things i work almost all day at restaurant.
customer_reviews.text: the product it's ok for the price the 2 things has to try to fix is the pice inside to keep the foot comfortable for better quality and the back part make it hitter bit more taller so can gets he feet out,the quality of those are good i buy it just to try and the price is ok, can be better if you do those changes so the people will be more confprtable and buy those more. if you change those things i will sent better request and reviews to my friend buy those too, i know many people who's work and restaurants.
customer_reviews.author: Rogelio De marcos

customer_reviews.title: Fallin Apart!!! Cant Return!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this same exact shoe for work for well over 8 years and have bough at least a dzn pair in that time. So I buy 3 pairs of these shoes this time just to plan ahead... and as of today 2 of the soles from 2 different pair have given out. I was about to return them but just realized that you only have 30 days to return. Missed it by less than 2 weeks. I don't have high hopes for my 3rd pair either. I now know that the product has become lower quality and I will not be getting anymore Sketchers in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe when you find proper fitting pair
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable inexpensive shoe for any wet/dirty application. Nonslip bottom makes these great for fishing. Easy on and off. No complaints other than sole may detach prematurely and sizing can vary greatly (do not buy online unless free return shipping)
customer_reviews.author: HERE TO HELP

customer_reviews.title: ... these as the Crocs I first bought wore out pretty quick. Their non slip soles are layered on ...
customer_reviews.text: got these as the Crocs I first bought wore out pretty quick. Croc non slip soles are layered on and detached fairly quickly, whereas Sketchers are an integral part of the shoes and will not detach. These are also a pure clog. Initially they feel a bit snug but with a few uses they adapt to your foot and then do not loosen anymore. I like them. Good for standing as extremely well cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: PHOG

customer_reviews.title: These didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were a name brand with a "padded collar" to be easy on my ankle area. No such luck - the edges of the shoes were not padded; they were sharp to the touch. After first trying them on, I was afraid to wear them for fear of damaging my foot. I suppose if you were wearing a couple pair of heavy socks they might be OK but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: G. H.

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a large feet, and to find this shoe in my size (14) has always been a problem. This clog is wide, which gives me the room I needed, I am very satisfied with my purchase. My purchase arrived sooner than expected:
customer_reviews.author: Michael Jackosn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap glue
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened in the last year but Sketchers shoes are not lasting more than a couple weeks until the glue on the soles start coming off. Last pair only lasted 6 days. ????? Switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: maddog

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good but after just over a week of use soles fell apart. Nonskid part got unglued and created a hazard for me at work. Would not recommend the item due to poor quality. Will be sending mine back
customer_reviews.author: aleksey milman

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY WHAT I WAS LOOKING FOR.
customer_reviews.text: THIS PAIR OF CLOGS WAS EXACTLY WHAT I WAS WAS LOOKING FOR. I NEEDED FOOT PROTECTION FROM A SECURE SHOE THAT WOULD BE EASY TO SLIP ON AND OFF. THESE CLOGS WERE JUST WHAT THE DOCTOR ORDERED. THEY ARE ALSO VERY NON SLIP ON ANY WET SURFACE. THANK YOU SKECHERS FOR WHAT YOU DO.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL V DOBRY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Unexpectedly comfortable. Highly recommended for standing on your feet or walking on a hard floor.
customer_reviews.author: G.W.

customer_reviews.title: Ok for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Slight imperfection in the top inside of the right clog which causes some discomfort. The right clog is tighter at the opening than the left which may be a result of the irregularity. It looks like it was an issue with manufacturing when the shoe may have been removed from a mold. The left clog is very comfortable and the right one is fine on the bottom of the foot. I have to take responsibility for not requesting an exchange.I kept them thinking they would stretch or I could wear them in so to speak. I do think that if not for the imperfection particular to my order, these would be quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable
customer_reviews.text: My husband's working in the yard shoes were wearing out and this was the kind of footwear he wanted to replace the old pair. There were a ton of reviews bad-mouthing these clogs which I read only after I'd ordered. To my pleasant surprise, he has found no problems with them at all! How "smart" they look is not important in this case...but sticking to his feet and giving decent support and protection from rocks, snow, rain, etc. ARE important to us. They cost much less than many clogs reviewed before we made the decision to go with these which is a satisfying thought!
customer_reviews.author: B. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The bottom panel separated from the sole of shoe. On both shoes! We’ve had these before without an issue,but this pair completely fell apart, not even a month of wear. Very disappointed in the quality of this pair. We’ve had the exact same pair that lasted 4 years,this pair lasted 4 weeks...electrical tape isn’t even keeping them from flapping around,it’s dangerous actually.
customer_reviews.author: michelle voelker

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks, minor use around the yard, the grip surface on the soles started to peel away. I would have expected these to last longer. Other than that, these were good.
customer_reviews.author: ReagansDad

customer_reviews.title: 3 strikes and your out sketchers
customer_reviews.text: I used to get these all the time and they were good for the price. I have ordered and sent back three pairs in two months. The bottoms keep coming out. Bought some Birkenstocks, no more sketchy sketchers for me. Clog in picture is 4 days old.
customer_reviews.author: paul gust

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase but sizing has changed.
customer_reviews.text: While I have purchased before and love their easy on and off along with water proof quality, this last pair was way too small. I have always purchased in same size. I have old identical size and compared to latest order there is >1” length difference. I’d probably need to order two sizes larger than my true size for good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery C. Ottesen

customer_reviews.title: Heal very short
customer_reviews.text: We returned them. The shoes fit, but the heal is so short that the shoes flopped up and down at the heal. My husband loves the Crocs work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: ZoeyB.

customer_reviews.title: Blistering of feet
customer_reviews.text: Put on these shoes. When I work, the edges of the shoes will rub my feet. The feet will blister. Maybe it is too tight. Except for this problem, everything else is good
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen shoe I know of
customer_reviews.text: Bought these on a whim several years ago and have never bought anything else. Never slipped in them even on wet floors. Great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: cooknTbone

customer_reviews.title: These clogs are definitely the most comfortable for the price
customer_reviews.text: I manage a high volume restaurant and get very little durability with these shoes. This is my second attempt at purchasing these and with the same exact result. As mentioned, I work in high volume restaurant and these shoes are constantly in the "elements" (i.e. oil, trash, water, and other food debris). After a few months, the slip resistant sole becomes detached after working an average 50-55 hrs a week- both times it has been purchased. These clogs are definitely the most comfortable for the price... now if the manufacturer could just tweak the sole against the normal work environments which I work in, I would rate these five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for rubber shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit is somewhat on the large side but its okay, I am not going to be doing any running in them. Quality seems to be good. I use clogs more like slippers for the garage so this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Just a bit to large
customer_reviews.text: Grandson said these clogs "flip" in the back when he walked. He wears a size 10 sneaker and these were a size 9.
customer_reviews.author: N. C. Hager

customer_reviews.title: Sole came unglued twice! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine. However the construction is crap my the soles have come unglued twice two different pairs. Don't buy
customer_reviews.author: C. Bartschi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my culinary class
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my culinary class. I don't know how it would hold up in the real culinary world, but it passed the test for me. Good fit and I even had room for my Vionic inserts.
customer_reviews.author: HoolyJulie

customer_reviews.title: So far, these shoes are towing the line. ...
customer_reviews.text: So far, these shoes are towing the line. 12 hour days, 6-7 days a week, and they are not displaying any of the negatives I've encountered with other shoes or boots. The only drawback for me was that the top of the shoe came up higher than is expected, but no worries, a box cutter removed the part that was tight, and smooth sailing since!!!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Half decent pair.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe of the pair was excellent in all the rated aspects above, but one was a very poor fit across the top.
customer_reviews.author: John of WV

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe fits very tight with no space at the back end. Because of its raw material, after an hour with socks I started to sweat, Without socks it's even worst and the internal lining sticked to my foot while taking off the shoes. After 30 hours of few days of use, Clog sole began to fall apart. Not the quality expected from brand as Sketchers.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bar

customer_reviews.title: Stiff, but breaks in...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair...I got them for camping...can walk around the camp and not worry about mud, wet, etc.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I am a bit late to the party in writing a review. I think I bought my sketchers about three years ago. I have worn these for that time at work knocking over big hours in professional kitchens and I have smashed them about about as much as anyone could. Put simply, they keep coming back for more. Comfort wise, they are by far the best shoes I have worn at work. Grip wise, I think I could walk on the roof in them - well almost :-)
customer_reviews.author: Col

customer_reviews.title: These shoes where comfortable but they fell apart
customer_reviews.text: Don't get this shoes!!!!!!! These shoes where comfortable but they fell apart. The sole of the shoe fell off after three months of wearing them. I paid good money for them and this should not happen so quickly. Don't get this shoes
customer_reviews.author: billyboy808

customer_reviews.title: Sole failure with light use in a few months
customer_reviews.text: They were smaller than my other shoes of the same size so pretty hard to put on. Then the non slip sole came unglued. I would not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Therese

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: The clogs look to be well made and my son likes them very much. Almost looks good enough to wear to town,
customer_reviews.author: L.F.

customer_reviews.title: fell apart 10 days after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to wear in the garden. He's only had them for less than 2 weeks and the sole grip is peeling off. He loved the fit and feel but these just didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B.

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t write these but I’m so aggravated about this product. I have only wore them to work for two days and they are completely falling apart. It going to be a long double shift. I will say amazon’s costumer service took care of me. They are second to none. Would never buy this again
customer_reviews.author: mike anderton

customer_reviews.title: 6 months later...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these shoes, I really did, but after only about 6 months, the sole of my right shoe is already coming off. I work in a college campus kitchen working for an average of 12 hours a day, and I had a pair of $20 TredSafes last for 2 years before the sole came loose. Really disappointed they didn't last as long as a Walmart brand. Other than that, the fit was great, comfy insole, and sturdy construction. Just wish the most important part, the sole, would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Stevezy

customer_reviews.title: Good mid priced shoe for a full day on the cook line.
customer_reviews.text: Upon first view, I was disappointed, then I spent an 8 hour day on the cook line. They were comfortable and light. Almost unnoticeable which is great for new shoes. Definitely worth the price, but you are getting exactly what you pay for, nothing more.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Callicoat

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes that the shoes r so lightweight! Also they help protect his feet from moisture!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Addison

customer_reviews.title: The quality of Skechers shoes is always great. We always have what we pay for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Skechers Balder Work Clogs for my husband. He has other shoes of this brand (different models), He is wearing shoes of this brand several years and he loves it. The quality of Skechers shoes is always great. We always have what we pay for. No disappointments. I recommend this brand shoes to everybody who love high-quality and comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.author: Elena Makarov de Sokolova

customer_reviews.title: Nice to.stand in, not for.a fast walking ER nurse
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable to stand in onky....and since I walk... alot.....I need a better supportive shoe... these flop.around reducing walking speed and make a weird clip.clop sound like instead of a nurse your a pony prancing around
customer_reviews.author: Philip Wright

customer_reviews.title: They are not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: I am a chef in a restaurant and I give it a normal use 40 hours a week, in less than 3 weeks the non-slip sole is already detached, I understand that they should not take any water and that is a problem because always in this style of work from time to time when shoes get wet with some kind of liquid. Disappointed because even the box said waterproof and it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco J. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Better then cheap walmart shoes
customer_reviews.text: Usually I just buy treadsafe shoes from walmart for about $25 and get 3 to 4 months of restaurant usage before they come apart. These skechers were on sale for $33 so gave them a shot. So far after 3 months, no issues, holes or loose seams. Great shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M. Chiodo

customer_reviews.title: Nothing great
customer_reviews.text: It's hard and even though I'm wearing it for a while it's not softened as expected, rigid and almost feels like plastic. Nothing great. It does fit right and the support isn't great either. All you can expect from a 30$ product
customer_reviews.author: aldrin phillips

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.text: These clogs, made of high quality rubber are very comfortable yet support one beautifully as well. They are also as easy to care for as any such shoes I've ever had; when they become dirty or dusty, wiping them with a clean, damp cloth renders them looking new again. I'd bought a pair at a store, and since I like them so much I bought another pair through my beloved Amazon! I WISH THEY CAME IN BROWN, TOO! I would not be without them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cusumano

customer_reviews.title: Never felt a pain from first wear
customer_reviews.text: Never felt a pain from first wear, this is the best I've ever. Bought it for kitchen job and it has not failed me yet.
customer_reviews.author: horace

customer_reviews.title: Tight on the top of the foot
customer_reviews.text: I had to take the insoles out to fit and still tight on the top of the foot
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the kitchen. This is my husband’s second one purchasing his same shoe. Lacks support so he does have to add an insole for support.
customer_reviews.author: Teri P

customer_reviews.title: l bought this product hoping that it will be easy on my heals
customer_reviews.text: l bought this product hoping that it will be easy on my heals. just the opposite happened,it is a low quality shoes and has no cushions on the heal. Uncomfortable to wear and gives me pain on my foot. I usually walks due to my work and mostly always on my feet. This is the most uncomfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: saji george

customer_reviews.title: odd construction
customer_reviews.text: Sole is a two-piece non-slip rubber part. The part is glued to the more flexible plastic Croc's-like upper. Sole does not stay adhered to upper so it curls and falls off. Without the non-slip sole the shoes are really slick. Also the upper has kind of an un-polished, not really black dull hue. Shoes are also wide like Croc's I do wear them to work and they are comfortable but expected to look and wear a little better than they did.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dahlem

customer_reviews.title: Kinda tight
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a size larger. Still very tight across the instep, painfully so after a standard chef shift. They're very comfortable other than that though. Very slip resistant and stable even on greasy floors. Very comfortable insoles.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves these. He wears them around the house and on errands, they're super comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Phinney

customer_reviews.title: Try them !
customer_reviews.text: Thought I try these and see how they felt on my feet . Best I’ve found
customer_reviews.author: Marc Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Worst work shoes I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: My feet slide out when I walk. Also I noticed my feet smell after a day at work. That never happened with my sneakers, Crocs and Soerry boat shoes. But the sliding out is the worst thing about these shoes. Wish I never bought these.
customer_reviews.author: R.E.G

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: It fits as expected and this is the second time we have purchased the same brand and item. It is used for work and lasts about a year or a year and a half with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: E gon reader

customer_reviews.title: Sole peels off easily.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly designed product. The sole separates from the bottom of the shoe. I returned the first pair. Same thing happened to the replacements after one day of normal inside use.
customer_reviews.author: sandbager99

customer_reviews.title: Very thin construction on the top.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed when I caught my shoe under the edge of a filing cabinet and it ripped a hole right through the thin top. The shoes are comfortable, but they are way too thin on the top. Not really usefully for a busy surgical tech.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Need a longer return window
customer_reviews.text: Shoe was a little big for my friend and he didnt get to the shipping store in the 30 day period so i have a 45 dollar door stop thats 5 sizes to big for me....
customer_reviews.author: michael knoll

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen shoes
customer_reviews.text: Don't know what everyone is crying and bitching about. The size is spot on. I wear 10/-11 11 fits perfectly.. Super light and comfortable... I think some people have nothing better to do than to bash good products. Get a life. Order these shoes if you work in a kitchen. They aren't Birkenstock yet a third of the price..💪🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: mark m

customer_reviews.title: Cheap sole
customer_reviews.text: I’m more upset at myself right now, because if I read the reviews I may not have purchase it. Just like everyone else I worn the shoes for a week or less and the sole fell apart. Something felt strange as I was walking one day, so I took the shoes off to look at it and I was very surprised to see the sole falling off on both shoes. I’m VERY DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.author: Ama

customer_reviews.title: ... size 13 and some are wider and far more comfortable than others
customer_reviews.text: All of my shoes are size 13 and some are wider and far more comfortable than others, but I can't even get my foot into these. I've worn many different kinds of kitchen clogs and the best are the softer rubbery ones, whereas these are harder and more plasticky.
customer_reviews.author: donald sharkey

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: I liked its highly smoothened surface , & its unique design
customer_reviews.author: Abdallah Ibrahim

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: I had this shoe for two months and wear it 3 days a week. The sole is already separating.
customer_reviews.author: shimmers1AW

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but a little loose
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy, but the heal is a little loose when walking and a size smaller wold be to small.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

product_meta.title: Skechers for Work Men's Balder Slip Resistant Work Clog
product_meta.description:
The workday can be long and tough, but this Skechers clog is as easy on your feet as can be. Its lightweight, flexible EVA upper is durable, its removable cushioned footbed will keep you comfy hour after hour, and its slip-resistant outsole ensures secure footing.

Skechers is an award-winning global leader in the lifestyle footwear industry that designs, develops, and markets lifestyle footwear that appeals to trend-savvy men, women, and children. The company's success stems from its high-quality, diversified, and affordable product line that meets consumers' various lifestyle needs. Since its inception in 1992, Skechers' diverse product offering has grown from utility-styled boots to include seven Skechers brands and five uniquely branded fashion lines for the whole family.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Work clog featuring shock-absorbing padded footbed, padded collar, and OSHA-compliant slip-resistant outsole
